html:
2026-0058
2026-01-30FINFinancial Administration ActAppointment of auditors and joint auditors of the Canada Development Investment Corporation and its wholly-owned subsidiaries for the 2025 fiscal year. Order reappointing (1) PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as auditor of the Canada Development Investment Corporation and its wholly-owned subsidiaries the Canada Hibernia Holding Corporation, Canada Eldor Inc., the Canada Indigenous Loan Guarantee Corporation, Canada TMP Finance Ltd., the Trans Mountain Corporation, the Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation, the Canada Innovation Corporation, and 16342451 Canada Inc. for the financial year ending on December 31, 2025; (2) Deloitte LLP as auditor of the Canada Growth Fund Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Canada Development Investment Corporation, for the financial year ending on December 31, 2025; and appoints (3) the Auditor General of Canada as joint auditor of the Canada Development Investment Corporation and its wholly-owned subsidiaries the Canada Hibernia Holding Corporation, Canada Eldor Inc., Canada TMP Finance Ltd., the Trans Mountain Corporation, the Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation, the Canada Growth Fund Inc., the Canada Innovation Corporation, and 16342451 Canada Inc. for the financial year ending on December 31, 2025.N/A
subject: Appointment of auditors and joint auditors of the Canada Development Investment Corporation and its wholly-owned subsidiaries for the 2025 fiscal year.
precis: Order reappointing (1) PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as auditor of the Canada Development Investment Corporation and its wholly-owned subsidiaries the Canada Hibernia Holding Corporation, Canada Eldor Inc., the Canada Indigenous Loan Guarantee Corporation, Canada TMP Finance Ltd., the Trans Mountain Corporation, the Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation, the Canada Innovation Corporation, and 16342451 Canada Inc. for the financial year ending on December 31, 2025; (2) Deloitte LLP as auditor of the Canada Growth Fund Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Canada Development Investment Corporation, for the financial year ending on December 31, 2025; and appoints (3) the Auditor General of Canada as joint auditor of the Canada Development Investment Corporation and its wholly-owned subsidiaries the Canada Hibernia Holding Corporation, Canada Eldor Inc., Canada TMP Finance Ltd., the Trans Mountain Corporation, the Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation, the Canada Growth Fund Inc., the Canada Innovation Corporation, and 16342451 Canada Inc. for the financial year ending on December 31, 2025.
